content: the anima pumpkin is one of those designs that had to be part of my crochet pattern collection because they decorate so beautifully and are made with such ease constructed of two main pieces to practice back and forth and in the round work with additional notions to practice such as back loop single crochets and short rounds to achieve that lovely textured weave but still easy skill level for all to try **finished size** 4 7 x 2 8 / 12 cm x 7 cm without stem **suggested materials** - one 100 gr / 3 5 oz 80 m / 87 yd skein of worsted weight 100% cotton yarn in white or green - one 100 gr / 3 5 oz 80 m / 87 yd skein of worsted weight 100% cotton yarn in beige - 4 5 mm g-7 crochet hook - stitch marker - stuffing - tapestry needle - measuring tape - scissors **skill level** easy this design includes basic crochet stitches simple shaping and finishing techniques stitches and techniques slip_stitch single_crochet back loop single_crochet design attributes worked back and forth worked in the round seamed pattern attributes row by row instructions written pattern for techniques involved photo tutorial showing important steps of the process video tutorial showing process for the project materials are not included finished products based on my patterns may be sold in small quantity giving me credit for the design as chabepatterns and promoting your products using your own photos want to buy more than one pattern there are special discounts buy 2 patterns together and get 10% off discount coupon code 10percentoff buy 3 patterns together and get 15% off discount coupon code 15percentoff buy 4 patterns together and get 20% off discount coupon code 20percentoff buy 5 patterns together and get 25% off discount coupon code 25percentoff add the patterns you want to buy to your cart and before checking out select the coupon code option then enter the correct code that applies please note i can t apply a discount after payment is completed
